sourcesContent:
{{ title }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent { title = 'TodoList App'; menuOpen = true; darkMode: boolean = false; toggleMenu() { this.menuOpen = this.menuOpen ? false : true; } onToggleMode() { this.darkMode = this.darkMode ? false : true; } }
